basics.name: Siddharth Gelera
basics.label: Principal Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience building secure, scalable applications across the full stack. Proven strengths in backend optimization, developer tooling, scalable frontend development, DevOps, and open-source contributions.

work.name: NearForm
work.summary: Contributed to core Node.js projects and ensured scalable OSS deployment pipelines.
highlights: Contributed to key OSS in the Node.js ecosystem
Improved CI/CD setup, reducing deployment time by 25%
Enhanced system infrastructure for developer experience and code maintainability

work.name: Fountane
work.summary: Directed full-stack development teams and led architecture for multiple products including ComplyIQ, impoweredTeam, and Parkpoolr.
highlights: Increased developer feedback cycle speed by 30% through tooling automation
Optimized Redis-based search latency to 8ms for enterprise analytics platform
Led impoweredTeam from MVP to acquisition stage
Delivered ComplyIQ platform for US-based tax compliance
Refactored reporting engines, reducing processing time by over 40%

work.name: Valuefy
work.summary: Engineered core modules for portfolio curation and analytics in a financial tech stack using React, Node.js.
highlights: Built custom UI components improving load times by 20%
Integrated financial APIs and optimized backend to scale 2x user load

work.name: Cartisan
work.summary: Improved operational portals and handled B2B integrations for after-sales automotive services.
highlights: Refactored legacy backend and improved transaction workflows
Built garage/service center dashboards and onboarding UX

work.name: RetailIO
work.summary: Maintained & built UI components across web and mobile platforms.
highlights: Developed UI for financial reporting tools
Created reusable internal component libraries

work.name: HoppApp
work.summary: Founding engineer for admin portal of ride-sharing startup.
highlights: Built admin dashboard and route-planning modules
Enabled trip analytics and driver onboarding workflows

projects.name: preact-island-plugins
projects.description: Bundle plugins for partial hydration across Preact and other small frameworks.
highlights: Improved hydration times by 2x for static sites

projects.name: goblin.run
projects.description: Golang binary build service with multi-platform support.

projects.name: preact-native
projects.description: Bridge abstraction for React Native concepts using Preact. (Discontinued)

projects.name: ComplyIQ
projects.description: Built from scratch, ComplyIQ handles state-by-state tax compliance workflows for US companies.
highlights: Reduced tax reporting time by 70%
Integrated automated document generation and calendar reminders

projects.name: impoweredTeam
projects.description: Built productivity-centric platform for performance-driven teams from PoC through to acquisition.
highlights: Scaled to 5k+ users
Led frontend/backend teams

projects.name: Parkpoolr
projects.description: Peer-to-peer parking platform built from MVP to market-ready acquisition stage.
highlights: Reduced onboarding time by 50%
Designed modular microservices
